<style type="text/css">

      /* Responsive styles */

      @media (min-width: 1200px) {
      .popular .nav-tabs > li > a {
      padding-left: 12px;
      padding-right: 12px;
      }
      .inverse-caption .carousel-caption h4 {
      font-size: 24px;
      }
      }

      @media (min-width: 768px) and (max-width: 992px) {
      .nav-tabs > li {
      float: none;
      }
      .nav-tabs > li > a {
      padding-left: 12px;
      padding-right: 12px;
      border: 1px solid #ddd;
      border-bottom-color: transparent;
      border-radius: 0;
      margin-right: 0;
      }
      .nav-tabs > li > a:hover {
      border-bottom-color: #ddd;
      }
      .nav-tabs > .active > a,
      .nav-tabs > .active > a:hover,
      .nav-tabs > .active > a:focus{
      border-bottom-color: #ddd;
      }
      .nav-tabs > li:first-child > a {
      border-radius: 4px 4px 0 0;
      }
      .carousel-caption {
      position: static;
      padding: 28px 15px;
      background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.75);
      }
      .inverse-caption .carousel-caption {
      color: #fff;
      text-shadow: none;
      padding-top: 8px;
      }
      .inverse-caption .carousel-indicators li {
      border: 1px solid #fff;
      }
      .inverse-caption .carousel-indicators .active {
      background-color: #fff;
      }
      .carousel-caption h3 {
      margin-top: 0;
      }
      .carousel-indicators {
      bottom: 0;
      }
      .picture-caption {
      position: static;
      padding: 10px;
      }
      .picture-caption h4 {
      line-height: 18px;
      font-size: 16px;
      }
      .picture-caption p {
      line-height: 18px;
      }

      }

      @media (max-width: 992px) {
      .navbar-fixed-top,
      .navbar-fixed-bottom {
      position: fixed;
      }
      .navbar-fixed-top .navbar-inner,
      .navbar-fixed-bottom .navbar-inner {
      padding: 5px 35px;
      }
      }

      @media (max-width: 767px) {
      .carousel {
      margin-bottom: 20px;
      }
      .popular .nav-tabs > li > a {
      padding-left: 12px;
      padding-right: 12px;
      }
      .navbar-fixed-top,
      .navbar-fixed-bottom {
      position: static;
      }
      }
      @media (max-width: 480px) {
      .carousel-caption {
      position: static;
      }
      .carousel-caption {
      position: static;
      padding: 28px 15px;
      background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.75);
      }
      .carousel-caption h3 {
      margin-top: 0;
      }
      .carousel-indicators {
      bottom: 0;
      }
      .picture-caption {
      position: static;
      }
      .inverse-caption .carousel-caption {
      color: #fff;
      text-shadow: none;
      padding-top: 8px;  }
      .inverse-caption .carousel-indicators li {
      border: 1px solid #fff;
      }
      .inverse-caption .carousel-indicators .active {
      background-color: #fff;
      }
      }

      </style>
